titleStmt.title: [Entries from the Cherokee Supreme Court Docket, 1823-1834, New Echota] 1824 Oct. 27 : a machine readable transcription of an image

publicationStmt.publisher: University of Tennessee Special Collections Library

availability.p: This work is the property of the Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN. It may be used freely by individuals for research, teaching, and personal use as long as this statement of availability is included in the text. For all other use contact the Tennessee State Library and Archives, 403 Seventh Avenue North, Nashville, TN 37243-0312. (615) 741-2764.

bibl.title: [Entries from the Cherokee Supreme Court Docket, 1823-1834, New Echota] 1824 Oct. 27
bibl.note: This is an excerpt from the Cherokee Supreme Court docket for the years 1823 to 1834. The Cherokee Supreme Court convened annually in New Echota beginning on the second Monday in October and lasting three weeks. This is the excerpt from the Wednesday October 17, 1824 session, during which three cases were heard before the Court. Entries from this Supreme Court docket cover items ch100-ch163.

projectDesc.p: Created for the University of Tennessee Digital Library

editorialDecl.p: Quotation marks retained as data except inside q tags
Errors in transcription of the printed text controlled with X-Metal 2.1 spell-checker; text has also been thoroughly proofread.
Corrections and normalization represented by editorial tags.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

refsDecl.p: ID attributes provided for only those pages, chapters, or illustrations toward which a reference or figure points.

div1.head: Wednesday 27th
div1.p: Court convened agreeable to adjournment, Present their Honors &C. Jurors G. Saunders, Foreman &C
On an appeal from Amoia. It is the Opinion of the Court that the plaintiff shall pay Peter Hellerbraud, eight dollars.

Mary Taylor Ptf
vs
Fox Taylor Dft
a plea of debt It is the opinion of the Court, for it to be tried at Craw Fish town

Archy Doherty Ptf
vs
Jacob Harnage Dft
Court is adjourned untill tomorrow 10 Oclock
